name: Automated Call Recording and Management System
description: This pattern automates the recording of internal and external phone calls for a customer-service domain. It integrates with existing telephone systems to capture audio data, store recordings securely, and allows for retrieval through a digital interface. The system ensures compliance with data privacy and retention policies.

required_integrations: not sure, we just have a telephone system and speak to customers

llm_recommended_approach: Leverage cloud-based VoIP service providers like Twilio to capture call recordings. Store the recordings securely on AWS S3 with access controls. Use Node.js to build an API for retrieving call recordings and integrating with the existing customer service systems. Ensure compliance with GDPR by embedding privacy features like consent management and data encryption.
